Description: Available Now. Fantastic First Floor two bedrooms one bathroom apartment in a two-family house on a quiet street. It can come partially or fully furnished! Living room, dining room, front foyer, recently renovated bathroom. Washer/Dryer in basement. Exclusive driveway access included and permit street parking available. Walking Score A++. Tufts, Davis Sq, Porter Sq, Wegmans, Restaurants, etc. Easy access to 93N/S, 10-15 min walk to Green Line Ball Sq, two minutes walk to 101 bus, less than 25 minutes to Davis and Porter Sq stations. Move-in fee: First, last, security deposit, and broker fee. Looking for tenants with good credit score and reliable income.
